text:
@Jacob_Rees_Mogg Looking after a child does not mean traveling hours with them in an enclosed space with someone who apparently has Coronavirus symptoms.

Nor does it mean keeping them in the backseat of a car whilst you test your eyesight by taking the vehicle for a spin.
